body: @dubby ikr, I come here sometimes because sometimes it has good plot, but this is just stupid. If you’d ever inject it there, it would be used up in a matter of hours, as it’s injected almost directly into the bloodstream, and is likely dangerous. I don’t see the purpose of injecting if you’re gonna do it into the bloodstream, as pills/patches do that but far better, and you only need to know how much to use them,

As an actual trans person myself, I am going to give some answers. 

Page 5: He's injecting it in the wrong location, and the wrong depth. Generally, you want to inject directly into the largest muscle you can - and the easiest one to reach yourself is on the upper outside of your thighs about halfway. Of the thigh muscles, this one is the largest. Second, hormones are injected intramuscularly - that is, the serum is deposited inside the muscle so the body can use it slowly over the course of a week or so. That's usually an inch to an inch and a half long needle, alllll the way in. Every week.

Page 6: There are multiple female hormones, but estrogen alone will not make you lactate. Prolactin however, will. Also, breasts can take one to several months to grow. And it hurts like fucking hell when they grow in. Stiff sore tender nipples, all~ day. 

Page 10: Yes, the penis will shrink some, but this tends to occur after a generous amount of time. Like, 6 months+
